programme.title: Coronation Street
programme.desc: Faye invites Craig to meet Miley, and Paul has no intention of becoming Dee-Dee's charity case.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP01) While Moira is in Bosnia filming the Crows movie that she hopes will revive her acting career, David attempts to take his relationship with Patrick to new heights.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP02) A sleep-deprived Moira worries about a stack of old love letters addressed to Johnny from another woman, while David and Stevie are held up at David's store.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP03) Alexis and Johnny hatch a plan to impress a motel reviewer, while David and Patrick search for a new apartment.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP04) Johnny finds himself under financial pressure with the arrival of Moira's high-priced red carpet gown for the Crows movie premiere. David is conned into taking a road trip with Stevie.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP05) David and Patrick throw a housewarming party and Ted finally lets loose, while Johnny and Moira try their best to babysit Roland Jr. for the evening.

programme.title: Bienvenue à Schitt's Creek
programme.desc: (S05EP06) Moira and the Jazzagals take Jocelyn out for a night at the casino, while Johnny tries to navigate an awkward conversation with Stevie about intimacy in the workplace.

programme.title: The National
programme.desc: The National, hosted by CBC News chief correspondent Peter Mansbridge, is Canada's destination for original journalism and stories with added depth and context from CBC News bureaus across the country and around the world.

programme.title: Escape to the Country
programme.desc: (S24EP17) Jules heads to Sussex to help a couple find their first shared home together on a budget of £700k. Jules also finds time to meet a master craftsmen keeping the county's traditional trug making heritage alive.
